We had a wonderful experience at Passeig 9 on Rambla del Poblenou.  My wife and son shared the chicken and beef paella and I had the grilled salmon. Both dishes were excellent - the paella was the best I've ever had (yes, I sneaked some of their paella - it was a huge portion).  The salads were good and the desserts looked wonderful.  There appears to be a great selection of wines although I just had a cold Estrella with dinner.  One of the owners, David, and our waitress were very attentive.  We ate inside due to a light rain but dining outside on the Rambla is great.  This restaurant is highly recommended!
